Entries.Introduction: Hey, it's {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/Title}} }} @, the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.#$b#If you're looking for seeds, my shop is the place to go. I'll also buy produce from you for a good price!#$e#A little agriculture could really inject new life into the local economy!
Entries.Thu2: I really do appreciate your business, {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/Title}} }} @. I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.

Changes.LogName: Fix Pierre - Modded Dialogue + Custom Pronouns - Plural
